arts.ttl: View: Kevin Thelwell surely done at Rangers after what Hearts duo did vs Celtic
arts.sum: Kevin Thelwell is deservedly coming under increased scrutiny at Rangers. Thelwell was appointed by Rangers over the summer as Andrew Cavenagh and the 49ers looked... The post View: Kevin Thelwell surely done at Rangers after what Hearts duo did vs Celtic appeared first on Ibrox News.

arts.ttl: Celtic spend millions: Hearts manager Derek McInnes wary of Glasgow club's advantages
arts.sum: Derek McInnes has warned Celtic still have "advantages" over Hearts despite his side opening up an eight point lead over the Premiership champions.

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers cool on Hearts title hype as Celtic boss defends team selection
arts.sum: The struggling Hoops suffered back-to-back league defeats for the first time since December 2023 to fall eight behind the Jambos

arts.ttl: ‘Never worked harder’: Rodgers vows to end Celtic slump after Hearts defeat
arts.sum: ‘We’ve just got to hang in there and find the results’ Celtic eight points behind leaders Hearts after 3-1 defeat Brendan Rodgers insisted he has “never worked harder” to find on‑field answers after Celtic fell eight points behind Hearts in the Scottish Premiership with a 3-1 defeat in Edinburgh. The home team’s win means the champions have lost back‑to‑back league games and taken only 17 points from a possible 27 in their latest title defence. Rodgers denied he has lost appetite for the battle. “I’ve never worked harder in all my time here,” the Celtic manager said. “So the motivation is there to try and flip the levels that we’re at. It’s absolutely fine, it’s still so early. I think that’s the key point in it all. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Rodgers should have realised that Tynecastle was no place for rookies
arts.sum: Absolute shambles, this one is on Brendan Rodgers, as it was last week. Fail to beat Falkirk, and questions will be getting asked about his job. In fact it’s already started… For the second Sunday on a trot we suffered a defeat to leave us trailing today’s opponent Hearts by eight points, and yet again Read More

arts.ttl: No 'statement win' for McInnes as Rodgers wants 'perspective'
arts.sum: There is something special happening at Hearts, the question is can Celtic or any other team stop their title hopes?

arts.ttl: Hearts underlines title threat in Scotland by beating Celtic to move 8 points clear
arts.sum: The 40-year dominance of Glasgow giants Celtic and Rangers in Scottish soccer looks to be in serious danger of ending. Celtic slumped to back-to-back league defeats for the first time since 2023 thanks to second-half goals by Alexandros Kyziridis and Lawrence Shankland.

arts.ttl: Hearts show Brendan Rodgers what a a Ferrari really looks like as Celtic turn into Hotline laughing stock
arts.sum: Andy Newport takes your calls after Celtic fell even further behind Hearts in the title race

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers tells Celtic fans 'this is my responsibility' as he spots one positive in Hearts horror show
arts.sum: The Hoops crashed to a damaging 3-1 defeat at Tynecastle with Hearts soaring eight points clear

arts.ttl: Hearts 3 Celtic 1: Derek McInnes's men surge eight points clear at top of Premiership
arts.sum: Hearts surged eight points clear of Celtic at the top of the Premiership table with a convincing win over the defending champions at Tynecastle today.
